basic_info.description: üëã I'm Sergii Otryshko, a software developer with a background in law, telecommunications and customer service. I graduated  from Kyiv National Linguistic University with a master's degree in business law and after trying several different professions I fell in love with software development because of the truly unlimited number of options and possibilities it gives you and the potential to make the world a better place. Also I've always enjoyed solving puzzles so I guess I can call that the icing on the cake for me. I have various work experiences such as working as a legal assistant, cable technician and delivery driver, also I have a strong background in customer service. I firmly believe that I can leverage all my previous experience to my advantage in my new career to approach problems from non-standard angles and come up with customer-oriented solutions.

projects.title: Salmon Cookies
projects.description: My first project ever. A website for international cookie store, built with vanilla html, css and javascript. Features store locations with google maps iframes and data on cookie sales from different locations with ability to add a new store to the table with a form.

projects.title: Odyssey
projects.description: An interactive quiz game of country flags, showcasing hidden-gem destinations in an effort to promote local economic development, and educate consumers on ‚Äúfair trade‚Äù travel.
